Posts.Content: Dec 21, 2011 10:40PM bbburns wrote: I have stage four Her+ I have had 6 months of taxotere and carbo, off of chemo for six months with reaccerance Four months on Abrazene, carbo and taxotere. Off of chemo for 6 months Now reaccurance with bone mets in spine. I am looking into alternative treatment such as Oxygen theropy High doses of vitamin c. Trying to find anyone with alternative treatment experience. To all the women out there God bless you!! Keep praying and beleiving in a healing!!!
